descriptions: Does not identify any social environments relevant to health and well-being.
Identifies only one social environment without explaining its relevance.
Identifies a few social environments but lacks depth in explaining their impact.
Identifies several social environments and provides a basic explanation of their influence on health and well-being.
Clearly identifies and explains multiple social environments and their impact on health and well-being with specific examples.
Provides a comprehensive identification and explanation of various social environments, thoroughly analyzing their complex impacts on health and well-being with insightful examples.
Does not describe how social environments affect health and well-being.
Provides a vague or inaccurate description of the effects.
Describes some effects of social environments on health, but lacks detail and accuracy.
Describes how social environments can affect health and well-being in a general way.
Clearly describes specific effects of social environments on health and well-being, providing examples.
Provides a detailed and nuanced description of how social environments significantly impact health and well-being, offering comprehensive examples and insights.
Does not describe how social environments affect well-being.
Provides a vague or inaccurate description of the effects on well-being.
Describes some effects of social environments on well-being, but lacks detail and accuracy.
Describes how social environments can affect well-being in a general way.
Clearly describes specific effects of social environments on well-being, providing examples.
Provides a detailed and nuanced description of how social environments significantly impact well-being, offering comprehensive examples and insights.
Provides no examples or evidence to support claims.
Provides limited or irrelevant examples or evidence.
Provides some examples or evidence, but they are not well-explained or connected to the description.
Provides examples and evidence that support the description of how social environments affect health and well-being.
Uses relevant and specific examples and evidence to strengthen the explanation of the effects of social environments on health and well-being.
Integrates compelling and thoroughly explained examples and evidence to provide a sophisticated and insightful analysis of the effects of social environments on health and well-being.
